dont take it seriously and you will have fun.

This game CSGO, if it's FANS, will cheer because of his minor changes, jump for joy because of his classic reservation, and dance because there are new games to play. If it's an ordinary player, then they will think that this game is CSS with a gorgeous vest to "reload" after 7 years; If it is an objective player, he must know that although this game is not a masterpiece of 3A, it won't fall into the garbage on the street. It is an ordinary game that can spend more than ten hours on it.
